rows.label: qst202914_0010
rows.name:
Why did you go to such a
dangerous place all by yourself?

rows.label: qst202914_0020
rows.name:
Didn't you want to become
pretty? You were about to die
before that could happen.

rows.label: qst202914_0030
rows.name: I'm sorry...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0040
rows.name: But I really wanted this.

rows.label: qst202914_0050
rows.name: This is a Moondrop...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0060
rows.name:
Yeah. It's the flower you said
you liked, Tsuki-nee-chan.

rows.label: qst202914_0070
rows.name: I could only pick two, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0080
rows.name:
I wanted to give them to
you as a present, so I
tried my best to get them.

rows.label: qst202914_0090
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]For me?

rows.label: qst202914_0100
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: qst202914_0110
rows.name:
You taught me all sorts of things,
Tsuki-nee-chan, didn't you?

rows.label: qst202914_0120
rows.name: So I wanted to thank you for that...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0130
rows.name:
So you went through all that
fear and went to such a
dangerous place for me...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0140
rows.name: You really are...[ML:Dash ] a fool.

rows.label: qst202914_0150
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]But... [ML:Dash ]it's very pretty.

rows.label: qst202914_0160
rows.name: Do you like it?

rows.label: qst202914_0170
rows.name: It's truly pretty...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0180
rows.name:
I was just thinking that there's
something even prettier than a
Moondrop right in front of me.

rows.label: qst202914_0190
rows.name: Something prettier?

rows.label: qst202914_0200
rows.name: Yes...[ML:Dash ] and that is your heart.

rows.label: qst202914_0210
rows.name:
You can't see it, and it will never
take a physical form, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0220
rows.name:
your pure heart that cares for
others is more beautiful than
anything in this world.

rows.label: qst202914_0230
rows.name: My heart...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0240
rows.name:
It might be difficult
to understand now...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0250
rows.name:
But I'm sure you'll
understand one day...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0260
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]That's right. I should give
you something in return.

rows.label: qst202914_0270
rows.name: Please, take a good look...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0280
rows.name: Wow! Amazing!

rows.label: qst202914_0290
rows.name: Here, this is a thank-you from me.

rows.label: qst202914_0300
rows.name: Thank you, Tsuki-nee-chan.

rows.label: qst202914_0310
rows.name: No, thank you.

rows.label: qst202914_0320
rows.name: You know...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202914_0330
rows.name:
I'm going to become a
pretty and cool Driver.

rows.label: qst202914_0340
rows.name:
And then, I'll make you my
Blade, Tsuki-nee-chan.

rows.label: qst202914_0350
rows.name: You'll be my Driver?

rows.label: qst202914_0360
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: qst202914_0370
rows.name: Hehehe...[ML:Dash ] That sounds interesting.

rows.label: qst202914_0380
rows.name:
But my current Driver
is quite stubborn.

rows.label: qst202914_0390
rows.name: You'll have to try very hard, you know?
